ComicInfo.Title: Phantom Of The Killer Skies
ComicInfo.Summary:
Guest-starring the Phantom Eagle! A former World War I fighter pilot is trapped in a loop from his past, and is now seeking vengeance against the evil Hermann von Reitberger!
*Notes* Reprinted in Essential Ghost Rider #1Features the Hostess Fruit Pies ad, Spider-Man In The Trap
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-22 10:28:56. [CVDB15269]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Frank Robbins, Gil Kane, Frank Robbins, Frank Robbins, Gil Kane
ComicInfo.Inker: Frank Giacoia, Mike Esposito, Frank Robbins, Frank Robbins
ComicInfo.Characters: Friend , Ghost Rider (Blaze), Hermann von Reitberger, Hulk, Marduk Kurios, Mephisto, Miracle Man, Phantom Eagle, Rex Griffin, Roxanne Simpson Blaze, Thing, Zarathos
